title: Trend Micro VPN Proxy One Pro Link Following Denial-of-Service Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to create a denial-of-service condition on affected installations of Trend Micro VPN Proxy One Pro. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the Vpn Background Controller. By creating a symbolic link, an attacker can abuse the application to create a file. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to create a denial-of-service condition on the system.
addtionnal_details: Trend Micro has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://helpcenter.trendmicro.com/en-us/article/tmka-07247
timeline:
2024-01-28 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2024-06-10 - Coordinated public release of advisory
